Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees European and Japanese buyers: Taxes will be asked in the destination country. Please inquire at your local Customs Office before ordering as you will have to pay extra charges upon arrival of the parcel in your country - Guitar comes with OHSC in excellent condition and COA Overall condition: - Guitar is in very good condition - No breaks or structural repairs - Neck is straight and all electronics work as they should - Frets are in very good condition - Small bumps, edge wear, surface scratches over the body (front, back and sides) - Light buckle wear - Edge wear on the rounded part of the body next to the binding - Oxydation on each side of the headstock due to the chemical reaction between the rubber of the wall hanger and the Nitro finish - Gold hardware shows some patina but has nicely aged - White finish starts the natural aging process and is slightly turning into cream. More pictures available upon request Specifications: - Weight: 9 lbs 13 oz - Gibson 490R and 498T humbuckers - Medium C neck profile - Ebony fretboard (one of the last ones before Gibson started with the Richlite fretboards) - Grover Tuners - Gold Hardware - Maple Top and Mahogany back Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
Title: 2012 Gibson Les Paul Custom Alpine White with OHSC
ConditionDescription: Very good condition, please read description
